title: Google AI Essentials
details:
- 📘 Overview: This course provides a comprehensive introduction to artificial intelligence (AI) and its applications.
- 📚 Key Topics: Machine learning, neural networks, and AI tools and techniques.
- 🛠️ Skills Gained: Implementing AI solutions, understanding AI ethics and limitations, and applying AI to solve real-world problems.
- 🏆 Projects: Hands-on projects involving AI algorithms and machine learning models.

title: Foundations of User Experience (UX) Design
details:
- 📘 Overview: An introduction to UX design principles and practices.
- 📚 Key Topics: User research methods, wireframing, prototyping, and usability testing.
- 🛠️ Skills Gained: Creating user personas, developing wireframes and prototypes, and conducting user testing to improve designs.
- 🏆 Projects: Real-world case studies and design projects to build practical UX skills.

title: Crash Course on Python
details:
- 📘 Overview: A foundational course in Python programming designed for beginners.
- 📚 Key Topics: Python syntax, data structures, control flow, and basic libraries.
- 🛠️ Skills Gained: Writing Python scripts, working with data, and creating automation tools.
- 🏆 Projects: Practical exercises and projects involving data manipulation, web scraping, and automation.

title: IBM Full Stack Software Developer
details:
- 📘 Overview: This Professional Certificate encompasses 10 courses covering various application development and cloud technologies.
- 📚 Key Topics:
- HTML, CSS, JavaScript, GitHub
- Node.js, React
- Cloud Native practices, DevOps, CI/CD
- Containers, Docker, Kubernetes, OpenShift
- Python programming
- Databases, SQL, NoSQL, Django ORM
- Bootstrap
- Application Security, Microservices, Serverless computing
- 🛠️ Skills Gained:
- Developing cloud-native applications using modern technologies and practices.
- Hands-on experience with application development, cloud deployments, and CI/CD pipelines.
- Deployment of multiple applications on cloud platforms, application security, and microservices architecture.
- 🏆 Projects:
- Capstone project demonstrating comprehensive application of learned skills.
- Development and delivery of a Software as a Service (SaaS) solution using cloud-native methodologies.

title: Developing Front-End Apps with React
details:
- 📘 Overview: An in-depth course on building interactive user interfaces with React.
- 📚 Key Topics: React components, state management, React hooks, and routing.
- 🛠️ Skills Gained: Developing dynamic and responsive web applications, managing application state, and creating reusable components.
- 🏆 Projects: Hands-on projects involving React applications, including single-page apps and complex user interfaces.

title: Introduction to Front End Development
details:
- 📘 Overview: A beginner-friendly course on front-end development.
- 📚 Key Topics: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and basic web development principles.
- 🛠️ Skills Gained: Building and styling web pages, handling user interactions, and understanding basic web technologies.
- 🏆 Projects: Simple web projects to apply front-end development skills and create functional web pages.

title: Internship Certificate to Viet Japan Digital Co., Ltd.
details:
- 📘 Internship Overview: Practical experience working in a digital technology company.
- 📚 Key Responsibilities: Contributing to web development projects, collaborating with development teams, and applying industry best practices.
- 🛠️ Skills Gained: Practical skills in web development, teamwork, and project management.
- 🏆 Projects: Involvement in real-world projects with a focus on web technologies and software development practices.
